articles.title: Mark Ronson Hospitalized In DJ Accident - Stereogum
articles.content:
Mark Ronson has been hospitalized after a DJ accident. The legendary producer popped two bicep tendons in the middle of a set, per his Instagram post.

articles.title: Val Kilmer, who portrayed Batman and starred in ‘Top Gun,’ dies at 65 - The Washington Post
articles.description: The actor reached stardom with his charismatic performances as a naval fighter pilot in the “Top Gun” franchise and as the caped crusader in “Batman Forever.”
